name: Onaji (itch)
description:
Help Onaji rescue his girlfriend, chase after yukai , avoid obstacles and collect gold on the way

[How To Play - Normal Level]
-Tap the screen to jump 
-Avoid obstacles 
-Collect gold on the way

[How To Play - Boss Level]
-Tap the screen to jump 
-Avoid the fireballs of the boss
-Use kunai to fight back
